MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:15pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:20PM on Friday, 23 April 2021.
